text: Wide Blue Yonder () is a 2010 Norwegian British black comedy movie directed by Robert Young and based on the play by Hugh Janes. It stars Brian Cox, Lauren Bacall, James Fox, Hege Schøyen, Ingrid Bolsø Berdal and it was distributed by Europafilm. ==Other websites== * * Category:2012 comedy movies Category:2010s black comedy movies Category:British black comedy movies Category:Norwegian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Young Category:Movies set in Norway
title: Wide Blue Yonder (movie)
